attributes.action: Add an RSS feed for this list of petitions so we can be kept up to date
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rather than checking the site occasionally, our RSS readers can tell us when new petitions are added.

rejection.details: Thanks for your petition submission, but this is a programming question rather than something for the PM to worry about! We'll pass your comment onto the technical team.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
